revision.comment: Convert Infobox aircraft to Infobox aircraft type
revision.text: {|{{Infobox aircraft begin | name = BZK-005 | image = | caption = | alt = }}{{Infobox aircraft type |type = HALE (high altitude long endurance) [[UAV]] |national origin = [[PRC]] |manufacturer = [[Harbin Aircraft Industry (Group) Co., Ltd.]] |designer = [[Beijing University of Aeronautics & Astronautics]] |first flight = |introduced = |retired = |status = |primary user = |more users = |produced = |number built = |program cost = |unit cost = |developed from = |variants with their own articles = }} |} The '''BZK-005''' high altitude, long range [[UAV]] is a reconnaissance aircraft designed by [[Beijing University of Aeronautics & Astronautics]] and Harbin Aircraft Industry (Group) Co., Ltd. It is used by the [[People's Liberation Army Navy|Chinese Navy]].Wong, Edward. (2013, September 21). "Hacking U.S. Secrets, China Pushes for Drones," ''[[The New York Times]]'', p.A1 ff. At [[China International Aviation & Aerospace Exhibition|Zhuhai International Airshow]] 2006, video and models were demonstrated to the public regarding this UAV. BZK-005 has a few stealth features integrated into its design. It is believed that a satellite data link antenna is held in its large upper body dome.http://www.flightglobal.com/blogs/the-dewline/2009/10/chinas-global-hawk-revealed.html Under the body there are optic-electric sensor systems. It is expected that BZK-005 has cruising speed of around 170 km/h, service ceiling 8,000 m, max take off weight is around 1,200 kg, max payload over 150 kg. In August 2011, a BZK-005 crashed into farm field close to [[Xingtai]], [[Hebei District|He Bei]] province. Photos of wreckage were posted on various Chinese internet websites.{{cite web|url=http://airforceworld.com/pla/english/BZK-005-High-Altitude-Reconnaissance-UAV-China.html |title=BZK-005 UAV, AirForceWorld.com | work=AirForceWorld.com |accessdate=25 Aug 2011}} Specification:{{cite web| url=http://uav.81tech.com/uav-news/china-uav/1144.html | title=BZK-05 specification | accessdate=Oct 12, 2009 }} *Endurance (hr): > 40 *Cruise speed (km/hr): 150 – 180 *Ceiling (km): 8 *Normal operational altitude (km): 5 – 7 *Max take-off weight (t): 1.25 *Payload (kg): 150 *Launch and recovery: taxiing *Take-off distance (m): 600 *Landing distance (m): 500 == See also == * [[List of unmanned aerial vehicles of the People's Republic of China]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Unmanned military aircraft of China]] [[Category:Chinese military aircraft 2000–2009]] [[Category:Harbin aircraft|BZK-005]] [[Category:Chinese military aircraft 2010–2019]] [[Category:People's Liberation Army Navy]] {{UAV-stub}} {{aero-2000s-stub}}
